iplasma: Isimo sodaba esihlanganisa izinhlayiya ezishajiwe (ama-ion nama-electron)
ionic: Isibopho esakhiwe ngokukhanga phakathi kwama-ion ashajwe ngokuphambene
covalent: Isibopho esakhiwe ngokwabelana kwama-electron phakathi kwama-athomu
metallic: Isibopho esakhiwe ngokukhanga phakathi kwama-cations ensimbi amahle nama-electron asusiwe
i-balance equation: Isibalo samakhemikhali esinezinombolo ezilinganayo zama-athomu we-elementi ngayinye nhlangothi zombili
imvukuzane: Iyunithi esetshenziselwa ukukala inani lezinto (inombolo yezinhlayiya ze-Avogadro)
inombolo ye-athomu: Inombolo yamaphrothoni kunucleus ye-athomu (inquma ubunikazi besici)
isotope: Ama-athomu e-elementi efanayo anezinombolo ezahlukene zama-neutron
i-oxidation: Ukulahleka kwama-electron kusuka ku-athomu noma i-molecule
i-redox: Ukusabela kwamakhemikhali okubandakanya kokubili izinqubo ze-oxidation nokunciphisa
amandla okuqalisa: Amandla amancane adingekayo ukuze kwenzeke ukusabela kwamakhemikhali
i-catalyst: Into enyusa izinga lokusabela kwamakhemikhali ngaphandle kokudliwa
i-thermodynamics: Igatsha le-chemistry eliphathelene nokushisa, umsebenzi, izinga lokushisa, namandla
i-endothermic: Ukusabela kwamakhemikhali okumunca ukushisa okuvela endaweni ezungezile
exothermic: Ukusabela kwamakhemikhali okukhulula ukushisa endaweni ezungezile
